channel.title: Tesla Robotaxi Safety Improvement
channel.description: Will Tesla Robotaxis reduce crash rate by 30% in 2026?

item.title: Will Tesla Robotaxis reduce crash rate by 30% in 2026?
item.description: Tesla's robotaxis continue experiencing crashes despite safety monitors. Market resolves YES if Tesla reports 30%+ reduction in crash rates for autonomous vehicles operating with safety monitors by December 31, 2026.

resolution.rules: Market resolves YES if Tesla publicly reports or regulatory filings show a 30% or greater reduction in crash rates per mile driven for robotaxi operations compared to Q4 2025 baseline. Data must come from official Tesla reports, NHTSA filings, or verified third-party safety audits.
